aboutMe.text: Hello, I'm Anil, currently working as Associate Techincal Lead at TA Digital. Apart from being a technology enthusiast, I am a traveler and nature lover. I have 8+ years of extensive development experience in building numerous large-scale, performance-oriented enterprise web applications from scratch. Below are the areas that I hold my expertise in...

expertise.title: FRONTEND DEVELOPMENT
expertise.content: Front-End development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular, TypeScript, Vue JS, Handlebars, SCSS, Bootstrap, Webpack, Gulp

expertise.title: UI ARCHITECTURE
expertise.content: In depth experience in setting up frontend application architecture from scratch and integrating with backend platforms like AEM, Hybris, Sitecore

expertise.title: RESPONSIVE WEB DEVELOPMENT
expertise.content: In depth experience in responsive web development using Bootstrap, CSS Flex-box, CSS Grid. Good experience in using CSS Pre-processors (SCSS, LESS).

expertise.title: HYBRID MOBILE DEVELOPMENT
expertise.content: Experience in Hybrid mobile application development using Ionic framework

expertise.title: ACCESSIBILITY AND SECURITY
expertise.content: Knowledge of accessibility standards such as WCAG, 508 and knowledge of security best practices

expertise.title: PERFORMANCE TUNING
expertise.content: Expert knowledge of browser behavior, performance, compatibility and cross browser issues and solutions

experience.heading: Deloitte Consulting
experience.title: Senior Consultant
experience.text: Develop requirements, user interface specifications, end-user goals, and designs for E-Commerce based websites and software applications. Collaborate with product managers, developers, web producers, and designers throughout project lifecycle, from concept through implementation. Liaise with business analysts, clients, and users to maximize short- and long-term product success.

experience.heading: Innominds Software
experience.title: Senior Engineer - UI

projects.title: Ecommerce web application for a multi-level marketing company specializing in skincare products

workDone: Worked with clients, managers, and development team to develop efficient and consisted UI
Worked on setting up the frontend architecture of the project using Vue JS, Handlebars, Webpack, Babel, Node-SASS
Wrote reusable components and integrated with Hybris frontend.
Lead the frontend team and conducted the code reviews.
Analyzed and optimized performance by code chucking and lazy loading.
Created email templates by using foundation framework.

projects.title: Hybrid mobile application for a passenger railroad service provider

workDone: Setup the Ionic project from scratch and built complete.
Completely owned the train status module which is the most complex functionality of the application.
Worked on performance optimization.
AEM integration for content pages by consuming REST services.
Wrote unit test cases using Jasmine and Karma.

projects.title: Ecommerce web application for an American sportswear and footwear retailer

workDone: Worked on developing the UI components using Handlebars.
Closely worked with Hybris developers to integrate the UI components with hybris frontend.
Involved in peer code reviews and worked on performance tuning.
Provided support in troubleshooting UI issues

projects.title: A marketing and sales automation tool

workDone: Created a custom responsive web application to replace a legacy line-of-business web application using Angular JS.
Developed responsive interface using Bootstrap and used SASS for CSS.
Used Angular.js for connecting the API's using Angular.js $http service.

projects.title: Web application for an American health insurance company

workDone: Developed responsive interface using Bootstrap and used LESS for CSS.
Worked closely with backend developers for frontend and backend integrations.
Provided support in troubleshooting UI issues.
Involved in peer code reviews.

projects.title: Web application for an online university

workDone: Created a custom responsive web application to replace a legacy line-of-business web application using Angular JS.
Developed responsive interface using Bootstrap and used LESS for CSS.
Used Angular.js for connecting the API's using Angular.js $http service.
